text: Ivar Hippe (born March 19, 1953) is a Norwegian social democrat in Oslo. He is a journalist and is best known for being kicked out of Argentina during the British-Argentinian war. He wrote the book Mektig og avmektig: Tore TÃ¸nne, media og maktspillet bak kulissene. He is the brother of Jon Hippe. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian journalists Category:Writers from Oslo
title: Ivar Hippe
